Parameters.description: Parameters for the EQUIP_CLOTHING operation, which equips a wearable item onto an actor

entity_ref.description: Required. The entity to equip clothing onto.

clothing_item_id.description: Required. The ID of the clothing item to equip. Can be a placeholder like '{event.payload.targetId}'.

destination.description: Optional. Where to place any displaced/conflicting clothing. Default: 'inventory'.

remove_from_inventory.description: Optional. Whether to remove the equipped item from the actor's inventory. Default: true.

result_variable.description: Optional. Context variable name to store whether the equip succeeded (boolean).
